name: Mobile Banking App
scope:
Core Features:
1. Account Management
   - Balance checking
   - Transaction history
   - Account statements

2. Payments
   - Domestic transfers
   - International payments
   - Standing orders

3. Security
   - Biometric authentication
   - Transaction signing
   - Fraud detection

4. Additional Services
   - Bill payments
   - Investment overview
   - Customer support chat
cicd_pipeline: Build Pipeline: - Static code analysis - Unit tests - Integration tests - Security scans  Deploy Pipeline: - Automated staging deployment - Production deployment approval - Feature flag management - Automated rollback
nfr:
Performance:
- App launch time < 2 seconds
- Transaction response time < 1 second
- Offline capability for basic features

Security:
- Multi-factor authentication
- End-to-end encryption
- Compliance with PSD2 and GDPR

Reliability:
- 99.99% uptime
- Automatic failover
- Real-time backup

delivery_plan.Week 1:
Authentication & Security Setup
- Implement biometric login
- Set up encryption for sensitive data
- Configure secure session management
delivery_plan.Week 2:
Core Banking Features
- Account balance view
- Transaction history
- Fund transfer module
delivery_plan.Week 3:
Additional Services
- Bill payments integration
- Standing orders setup
- Recurring payments
delivery_plan.Week 4:
Testing & Compliance
- Security penetration testing
- Performance optimization
- Regulatory compliance checks
